text:
Zugata | Palo Alto, CA| Full Time | On-location only

Help us move to micro service architecture with Ruby on Rails and Python!

We are help employees grow by providing continuous feedback on how they do their job in the workplace. We process hundreds of thousand emails to determine who you work with most and to ask for their anonymous feedback.

We are hiring: Ruby on rails engineers, android engineers, iOS engineers, and data scientists.

stay awesome! interested: kevin@zugata.com
